item.title: Fitness Dashboard
item.description: Concept: My friends and I are big fans of a simple gym-tracking app that serves to replace a simple notebook and pen, called “FitNotes”.

item.title: Fitness Dashboard README
item.description: Fitness Dashboard Video Demo: https://youtu.be/Np4lORlm-Y0 Concept: My friends and I have been using the FitNotes mobile app to recording our weightlifting training data for years now, but the app is mostly for personal use, and so the information is not easily shared or visible to each other.

item.title: Serving a Flask Web App on AWS using Gunicorn And Nginx
item.description: Summary: In this example, I’ve hosted a flask web app on a personal domain, accessible to the public. The web server is hosted on an AWS Free Tier instance.
